myStaffingPro by Paychex is an award winning SaaS applicant tracking & paperless on-boarding suit. Use myStaffingPro to manage your recruiting, qualification, tracking, and hiring process. With more than 2,000 clients, myStaffingPro is not limited by industry, browser, or integration requirements. The suite supports businesses ranging from a small office to large enterprises. myStaffingPro is a sophisticated applicant tracking solution which includes advanced recruiting, qualification, tracking, compliance, on-boarding, offer management, and hiring capabilities.A leading provider and award winning organization, Paychex partners with companies of all sizes to provide end-to-end capital management across the United States. The Paychex product and service model is unmatched and enables us to create customized solutions specific to the needs and requirements for all businesses. As a publicly-traded company with more than 40 years of experience, 130 offices and 13,000 highly-trained employees spread throughout the US, Paychex is the partner of choice for over 570,000 clients nationwide and growing each year.
